title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 1 Picks and Betting Preview with Chad Millman
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 1 Picks and Betting Preview with Chad Millman
description:
Colin's NFL Week 1 picks are in, and he discusses them with Action Network CCO Chad Millman, including a surprising move Colin made on Jets/Panthers, (9:00) the Bills will fare as home favorites against the Steelers (13:00), which team has failed Colin for 37 straight years (17:00), how to bet Seahawks/Colts (25:00) and Chargers/WFT (28:00), why Browns/Chiefs play is a "no-brainer" (33:00), why Chad absolutely loves Colin's Niners/Lions pick (34:00), and the "gift" Chad is giving to Colin for this NFL season (44:00)

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
